name: Drawer Upgrades
pages: Upgrades are applied using different upgrade items. They increase the capacity of the drawer. $(br2)They are most useful when storing lots of items.

pages.text: The $(item)Upgrade Frame/$ is the base item of all upgrades.
The $(item)Drawer Upgrade I/$ is the first tier of the upgrade. It doubles the capacity of the drawer.
The $(item)Drawer Upgrade II/$ is the second tier of the upgrade. It multiplies the capacity of the drawer by 4.
The $(item)Drawer Upgrade III/$ is the third tier of the upgrade. It multiplies the capacity of the drawer by 8.
The $(item)Drawer Upgrade IV/$ is the fourth tier of the upgrade. It multiplies the capacity of the drawer by 16.
